name: full_stack_scripts
description: Used to run scripts in Front_End and Back_end

scripts.install:all: npm install && concurrently "cd ../Back_End/Python && pipenv run pipenv install --dev" "cd ../Front_End/React && npm install"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "cd ../Back_End/Python && pipenv run python src/server.py" "cd ../Front_End/React && npm run start"
scripts.test:all: concurrently "cd ../Back_End/Python/ && pipenv run behave test" "cd ../Front_End/React && npm test"
scripts.test:watch:all: concurrently "cd ../Back_End/Python/ && pipenv run nodemon -e py --exec behave test" "cd ../Front_End/React && npm run test:watch"
